title: Social Media Buzz: From Museum Selfies To Balboa Park
teaser: Laura Wingard of KPBS joins us for a look at what stories are buzzing on social media.
contentencoded:
We take a look at some stories that are reverberating online.

Here & Now‘s Robin Young speaks with Laura Wingard, digital editor at KPBS, about how Sheryl Sandberg mourned her husband online after his death a month ago, museum selfies having a moment, and the 100th anniversary of Balboa Park’s 1915 Panama-California Exposition.

  • More: Add your memories of Balboa Park

Guest

  • Laura Wingard, is the digital editor for KPBS in San Diego. She tweets @laura_wingard
Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
